 Place a conjunct in the scope of an existential quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)
statement:
exan.1 $e |- ( E. x ph /\ ps ) $.
exan $p |- E. x ( ph /\ ps ) $.
